title: Medic
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Medic>>
Sir, how is everything?
<</Textbox>>

[[That's all.|Medic.EndConv]]

[[Do you know what this is?|Medic.Clue]]

title: Medic.Clue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Do you know what this $CLUE is?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Medic>>
That is strange, did I misplace it?
<</Textbox>>

[[You misplaced this?|Medic.Reply]]

[[You're getting sloppy, Cerys.|Medic.Retort]]

title: Medic.Retort
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
You're getting sloppy, Cerys.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Medic>>
I am too busy cleaning up everyone's mistakes to put up with your insecurities!
<</Textbox>>

<<set $Medicloyalty to $Medicloyalty - 1>>

//End conversation

title: Medic.Reply
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
You misplaced this?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Medic>>
Yes, it should have been in $LOCATION. Were you stealing my possessions secretly?
<</Textbox>>

[[I found it.|Medic.KeyDialogue]]
[[You need to organize yourself.|Medic.Retort1]]

title: Medic.KeyDialogue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Of course not. I just found it in $CRIMESCENE.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Medic>>
Oh... My apologies, Captain. Someone must have moved it around.
<</Textbox>>

//Unlock Clue Key Dialogue

[[That's all.|Medic.EndConv]]

title: Medic.Retort1
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Of course not! You just need to organize yourself better.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Medic>>
I am too busy cleaning up everyone's mistakes to put up with your insecurities!
<</Textbox>>

<<set $Medicloyalty to $Medicloyalty - 1>>

//End conversation
